price: Maka himpunkanlah segala daya (sihir) kamu sekalian, kemudian datanglah dengan berbaris. Dan sesungguhnya beruntunglah orang yang menang pada hari ini 931.
arabic: فَأَجۡمِعُواْ كَيۡدَكُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱئۡتُواْ صَفّٗاۚ وَقَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَعۡلَىٰ
footnotes: 931.  Maksud "hari ini" ialah hari berlangsungnya pertandingan.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ajmiʿū kaydakum thumma i'tū ṣaffan waqad aflaḥa al-yawma mani is'taʿlā
